content: Sometimes with rod and line they would angle the fish which swim among the rocks; sometimes with their dogs and nets they would catch the hares which had fled from the vineyards, terrified by the noise of the grape gatherers.
translations: ita:A volte con lenza e canna da pesca catturavano i pesci che nuotavano tra le rocce; altre volte con cani e reti catturava
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Hybrid (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
